name: Fruits of the Void
description:
It is said that within the void there travels nomadic fruits. These fruits all seek an elusive kitchen harboring a bowl that protects all fruit from the ravages of time and the decay of the void. Some fruit are lucky enough to find this kitchen and some even make it into the bowl.  However there are many obstacles along the path to the bowl and it can be treacherous. Objects in the void are not always what they seem.  Be aware of your surroundings and you may succeed.

Controls:

Keyboard: W A S D for movement
Mouse: Move mouse to rotate camera
